Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani owenza izenzo (ezinhle) ezilungileyo futhi kulapho eyikholwa ngakho-ke angeke yenqatshwe imizamo yakhe futhi ngempela singabalobi bakhe
Futhi akuvumelekile edolobheni esalibhubhisa ukuthi bona bangaphindela
Kuze kube bayavulelwa uGog noMagog futhi bona bayoqhamuka kuwona wonke amacala behla
Futhi ngempela sesisondele isethembiso (usuku lokwahlulela), lapho amehlo alabo abangakholwanga ayobe egqolozele (bese bethi), “Oh! usizi kuthina sasingakunakile lokhu kepha sasiyizoni”
Ngempela nina kanye nalokho enikukhonzayo esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi niyoba yizinkuni zokuvuthisa isihogo, nina niyongena kusona
Ukube laba babengonkulunkulu babengeke bangene kusona (isihogo) futhi bonke bayohlala khona ingunaphakade
Okwabo lapho phakathi kuyoba ukuquma futhi bona lapho phakathi bayobe bengezwa
Ngempela labo abathenjiswa ubuhle obuvela kuthina bayobekwa kude naso
Angeke bazwe ngisho nomncane umsindo waso, futhi bona bayohlala ingunaphakade kulokho imiphefumulo yabo ekufisayo
Alubaphathi kabi uvalo olukhulu kakhulu futhi ziyohlangana nabo izingelosi (ziyothi) “Lolu usuku lwenu okuyilona enanithenjiswe lona.”
Ngosuku lapho siyobe sigoqa amazulu kuyobe kunjengokugoqwa kwamaqeqeba emibhalo njengoba sayisungula indalo yokuqala siyoyiveza kabusha (lesi) isethembiso kuthina ngempela siyokwenza (lokhu)
Futhi ngempela sabhala kwiZabur emva kwesikhumbuzo ukuthi umhlaba uyodliwa izinceku zami ezilungileyo
Futhi asizange sikuthumele ngaphandle kokuba ube ngumusa emihlabeni
Ithi, “kuphela kwembuliwe kumina ukuthi uNkulunkulu wenu nguNkulunkulu oyedwa, ngakube nina nizoba ngabazinikeleyo ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi na?”
Kephaumabefulathelaithi,“nginibizilenonkengokulinganayo angazi noma kuseduzane noma kukude lokho enethenjiswa kona.”
Ngempela yena uyayazi inkulumo esobala futhi uyakwazi konke lokho enikufihlayo
Futhi angazi ukuthi kuyisilingo kunina nenjabulo yesikhashana
Wathi, “Nkosi yami yehlulela ngeqiniso futhi iNkosi yethu ingenomusa ekuyiyona usizo lwayo olubhekana nalokho enikuchazayo”
